name: Spellcasting
description: As a conduit for divine power, you can cast cleric spells.

features.Cantrips: At 1st level, you know three cantrips from the cleric spell list. You learn additional cleric cantrips at higher levels, as shown in the Cantrips Known column of the Cleric table.

features.Spell Slots: The Cleric table shows your available spell slots. To cast a spell, expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. You regain all expended slots on a long rest.

features.Preparing Spells: Choose cleric spells equal to your Wisdom modifier + cleric level (minimum 1). Spells must be of a level for which you have slots. You can change prepared spells after a long rest, requiring 1 minute per spell level in prayer.

mechanics.ritual_casting: Can cast prepared cleric spells with ritual tag as rituals
mechanics.focus: Can use a holy symbol as spellcasting focus

name: Divine Domain
description: Choose a domain shaped by your deity and the gifts they grant you.
features: Grants domain spells and features at 1st level
Additional Channel Divinity options at 2nd level

domain_spells.description: Domain spells are always prepared and don't count against prepared spells. They are cleric spells for you even if not on the cleric spell list.

name: Channel Divinity
description: Channel divine energy directly from your deity to fuel magical effects.
features: Start with Turn Undead and domain effect
Choose which effect to create when using
Requires short/long rest to use again
DC equals cleric spell save DC

turn_undead.action: Present holy symbol and speak prayer
turn_undead.effect: Undead must make Wisdom save or be turned for 1 minute/until damaged
turned_behavior: Can only use Dash or escape actions
Can Dodge if nowhere to move

name: Destroy Undead
description: When undead fails Turn Undead save, it's destroyed if CR is at/below threshold shown in CR thresholds table.

name: Divine Intervention
description: Call on deity to intervene when need is great.

mechanics.action: Describe assistance sought and roll percentile dice
mechanics.effect: DM chooses intervention (cleric/domain spell effect appropriate)
